content: ***this is a listing for a pdf printable pattern not a finished product**** this amigurumi cow pattern is sure to bring some joy it works up fast and is a great size 13 inches for any little one to play with skill level easy/intermediate - this is a beginner friendly pattern with some sewing of parts materials you will need - size 4 worsted weight yarn in white black/brown pink beige - size 15 mm safety eyes - black embroidery thread for the eyelashes/eyebrows optional - 3 5 mm crochet hook - scissors - tapestry needle - stuffing us abbreviations used - mc - single_crochet - single_crochet increase - double_crochet - inv decrease you may make items to sell gift or donate with this pattern if you sell online please provide a link back to my website for credit as the designer www graceandyarn com you may not sell make copies or share the actual pattern thank you these patterns and more are available for free on my blog at www graceandyarn com this listing is for an ad-free printable version with a full photo tutorial thank you for stopping by
